name: ESX-8CV Combiner
description: Drives the 8 outputs of an ESX-8CV module connected via an ES-5 expander. Features an adaptive mode for performance optimization or non-adaptive mode for predictable timing.

parameters.name: Expander
parameters.description: Chooses the expansion header on the ES-5 to which the ESX-8CV is connected.

parameters.name: Adaptive
parameters.description: Controls update mode: Non-adaptive updates all outputs continuously (predictable timing, 2kHz effective rate). Adaptive updates only changing outputs (better performance, variable rate 2kHz-16kHz).

parameters.name: Input 1
parameters.description: The input bus from which to drive output 1.

parameters.name: Input 2
parameters.description: The input bus from which to drive output 2.

parameters.description: The input bus from which to drive output 3.
